title: Android Developers

ambitionBoxData.Title: Trinity It Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• An Android developer is responsible for designing, developing and maintaining mobile applications for the Android platform
  • They work with Java or Kotlin programming languages and Android Software Development Kit (SDK) to create innovative and user-friendly applications
  • Other key responsibilities include:
  • Writing clean, maintainable and efficient code
  • Designing and implementing app features
  • Debugging and fixing bugs
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver end-to-end mobile solutions
  • Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologiesStrong problem-solving and communication skills are also necessary

title: Tekla API Developer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Techflow Engineers India Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
What is the Job Role

  • Developing TEKLA API plugins, add-ins or tools as required
  • Write clean, testable code using .NET programming languages
  • Test and debug various .NET applications
  • Deploy fully functional applications
  • Maintain and Upgrade existing programs
  • Support junior developers work
  • Document development and operational procedures

Educational Qualification:

Full time -B.Tech/ B.E. in Mechanical.

Work Experience:

Min. 3 Year experience in working with developing Macros and/or Applications Using CAD APIs like Tekla, SDS/2, AutoCAD to generate automated tools.

Software Proficiency Required:

  • Expertise in TEKLA and advance checking tools
  • Sound knowledge of TEKLA, SDS/2 and AutoCAD
  • Knowledge of Tekla API, and advance tool devlopment
  • Familiar with software development & Programming tools like VB.Net, C#, VBA, SQL Server & MS Office.
  • Java script, SQL, MySQL experience

What are our Expectations

  • Excellent Analytical skills required
  • Ability to work under pressure in given deadlines.
  • Should be smart, self-motivated, energetic, and passionate about the profession.
  • Work experience as a .NET Developer
  • Proficiency in building windows form App or WPF
  • In-depth knowledge of the .NET languages like C#
  • Additional skill preference: Java script, SQL, MySQL experience
  • Troubleshooting abilities
  • Good communication skills
  • Min. 3 years experience on development[plugin/tool/add-in] on top of any mechanical/civil software like Tekla, SDS/2, AutoCAD, Revit, etc. would be an added advantage.

title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
Our Client ASCENT is looking for Android Application Developer
 Job Designation: Android Application Developer
 Job Location: Mumbai-  Ghatkopar (East) 
 Experience: 1- 3Years.
 About us -  www.ascentinc.in
  
 
 ASCENT has an immediate opening for outstanding android mobile app developers to be responsible for developing innovative,  reusable Mobile Applications for progressive mobile presence for businesses and communities. Our developers work closely with our project managers,  strategists and design team members to develop specifications and make recommendations on the use of new and emerging technologies. Programming,  design and database administration are all elements of this position.
  
 
 Responsibilities
  Work closely with Project Managers and other members of the Development Team to both
 develop detailed specification documents with clear project deliverables and timelines,  and to
 ensure timely completion of deliverables.
  
 
  Produce project estimates during sales process,  including expertise required,  total number of people required,  total number of development hours required,  etc.
  
 
  Attend client meetings during the sales process and during development.
  
 
  Work with clients and Project Managers to build and refine graphic designs for applications. Must have strong skills in Photoshop,  Android SDK,  or equivalent application(s).
  
 
  Convert raw images and layouts from a graphic designer into Android themes.
  
 
  Determine appropriate architecture,  and other technical solutions,  and make relevant
 recommendations to clients.
  
 
  Communicate to the Project Manager with efficiency and accuracy any progress and/ or delays.
 Engage in out- of- the- box thinking to provide high value- of- service to clients.
  Alert colleagues to emerging technologies or applications and the opportunities to integrate them into operations and activities.
  Be actively involved in and contribute regularly to the development community of the technology of your choice.
  Develop innovative,  reusable Android- based tools for activism and community building.
  
 
 Required Skills
  
 
  B.E./ BSC in computer science or a related field,  or significant equivalent experience
  1 year minimum experience with mobile (android) app development
  1 year minimum experience working with relational database systems such as MySQL,  MSSQL or Oracle and a good working knowledge of SQL
  
 
  Development experience using extensible android tools
  Experience developing and implementing android projects
  Self- starter with strong self- management skills
  Ability to organize and manage multiple priorities
  
 
 This is an Immediate Opportunity candidate with less than one month notice will be preferred.
 Please ignore this mail if the above profile doesn t match with your current Job Role.

title: Senior Android Developer
jobDescription:
Our Client Testbook is looking for Senior Android Developer
 Job Designation: Senior Android Developer
 Job Location: Navi Mumbai ,  Maharashtra 
 Experience: 1- 3Years.
  
 
 About Testbook
  
 
 The fastest rising startup in the EdTech space,  Testbook is poised to revolutionize
 the industry. With a registered user base of over 2 lakh students,  1.27 lakh
 questions solved on the WebApp and a knockout Android App,  Testbook has raced
 to the front and is ideally placed to capture bigger markets.
  
 
 Testbook is the perfect incubator for talent. You come,  you learn,  you conquer. You
 train under the best mentors and become an expert in your field in your own right.
 That being said,  the flexibility in the projects you choose,  how and when you work
 on them,  what you want to add to them is respected in this startup. You are the sole
 master of your work.
  
 
 But it's not all about work. Testbook is a family that likes to party,  and often.
 Testbook is where you form bonds for life and connections that lasts forever. Just
 like that chacha you can't shake off on Whatsapp,  texting you about the next binge
 fest.
  
 
 The IIT pedigree of the co- founders has attracted some of the brightest minds in
 the country to Testbook. A team that is quickly swelling in ranks,  it now stands at 40
 in- house employees and hundreds of remote interns and freelancers. And the
 number is rocketing weekly. Now is the time to join the force.
  
 
 Job Description
  
 
 You're highly energetic and want to make an impact. We love people who are
 always looking to innovate. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of
 users,  many of whom will use their Android phones exclusively for interacting with
 our services. Being one of the very early hires you would also have a chance to head
 our Mobile development team in future.
  
 
 Desired Skills
  
 
 Solid understanding of Android SDK
 Must have sound knowledge of Android architecture
 Strong OOPs fundamentals,  Java ,  XML,  JSON,  Web Services,  SQLite databases
 Proficient with developing optimised UI for different android versions and devices
 1 years of experience in the Android ecosystem.
 You should have released a few apps on the play store or at least have a working
 prototype of something which you are proud of
 You love to write beautiful code
 Bachelors/ Masters in CS,  or equivalent experience
 Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills,  resourceful,  innovative,  and inventive
  
 
  
 
 Bonus:
 You have some Web development experience
 You have worked at a startup before and know that you are in for an exciting ride
  
 
 This is an Immediate Opportunity candidate with less than one month notice will be preferred.
 Please ignore this mail if the above profile doesn t match with your current Job Role.

title: Walk-in For Technical Support Novice - Ghansoli - Rotational Shifts
tagsAndSkills: Desktop Support,Remote Support,International Technical Support,Troubleshooting Skills,technical support,it support,customer service,Configuration And Troubleshooting
jobDescription:
Job Duties (include but not limited to):

  • Be able to install, configure, troubleshoot and resolve technical issues properly
  • Complete daily checklists, continuously monitor work queues and review and acknowledge all assigned tickets for the next day by the end of the current shift
  • Provide excellent customer support and technical services remotely
  • Take ownership of tasks and follows through to ensure complete resolution
  • Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment

What Our Ideal Candidate Will Bring:

  • The successful candidate should have a bachelors degree or equivalent certifications
  • A+, N+, CCENT, CCNA Certifications preferred
  • Minimum 0-1years of outstanding customer service experience
  • Minimum 0-1 years of technical support

Basic working knowledge of:

  • Windows Devices
  • Apple Devices
  • Understanding on Remote access tools such as; TeamViewer, MSP anywhere, LogMeIn, AnyConnect
  • Knowledge of a ticketing system like ConnectWise Manage
  • Office 365/Google Suite Administration
  • Networking basics
  • Hardware and Software Installations/Troubleshooting
  • Skills:
  • Excellent customer service skills
  • Excellent hands-on technical support skills
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • An eagerness to learn with a passion for technology
  • A positive personality, attitude and a team player

What Our Ideal Candidate Will Receive:

  • A company focused on maintaining a great company culture
  • An opportunity to make a difference in the company and to be rewarded for doing so
  • A company that is always looking to improve while adhering to our core principles.
  • An opportunity for career growth within the organization
  • Competitive compensation package with variable pay potential and benefits
